definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Shang1 wu4 yin4 shu1 guan3

definition: central business district (e.g. CBD of Beijing)

pinyin: Shang1 wu4 Han4 yu3 Kao3 shi4

sentences.english: Gathering frequent flyer miles is one of the perks of OCS travel.
sentences.chinese: 积累飞行里程是商务旅行的额外补贴之一。

sentences.english: Dates become a series of business negotiations, often hard-nosed.
sentences.chinese: 约会成为一系列商务谈判，常常就像讨价还价。

sentences.english: International business English teaching quality hearing can not be guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 国际商务英语听力教学质量无法保证。

sentences.english: U. S. Secretary of Commerce Gary Locke with Mr. Hong.
sentences.chinese: 康律师和美国商务部长骆家辉先生。

sentences.english: This passage is to discuss the lexical characteristics of Business English.
sentences.chinese: 笔者将从词汇角度，略谈一下商务英语的用词特点。

sentences.english: So you can also use this pattern in a business setting.
sentences.chinese: 所以你也可以在商务的场合里使用。

sentences.english: Caesar Palace Hotel is a foreign-related business-type hotel.
sentences.chinese: 凯撒皇宫大酒店是一家商务涉外型酒店。

sentences.english: CBRC shall, on the same day as issuing the approval certificate, submit to the Ministry of Commerce the approval certificate stub.
sentences.chinese: 银监会在代发当日将批准证书存根送商务部。

sentences.english: In addition it will meet some difficulties in imposing tax to the E-business.
sentences.chinese: 此外在对电子商务的征税中也会遇到一些问题。

sentences.english: OPENCASE is a professional business gifts company, one of the best business gifts companies in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海欧普凯商务咨询有限公司是一家专业的礼品公司。

sentences.english: It looks more a private club than a hotel lounge.
sentences.chinese: 那简直就是一个高档的私人商务会所。

sentences.english: The power to interpret the present Supplementary Provisions shall remain with the Ministry of Construction and the Ministry of Commerce.
sentences.chinese: 本补充规定由建设部和商务部按照各自职责负责解释。

sentences.english: Please take me to the RiverFront Business Hotel . Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 请把我送到上海龙东商务酒店，谢谢。

sentences.english: This is another example of how the Internet has become the fundamental game changer for global business.
sentences.chinese: 这是因特网变成全球商务的游戏改变者的一个例子。

sentences.english: This is Thomas Watt, the manager of The E-Commerce Transactions Company in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 这是托马斯的电子经理瓦电子商务交易在新加坡公司。

sentences.english: It can realize its function bye-commerce and the railway ticket selling system to combine.
sentences.chinese: 电子商务与铁路售票系统结合可实现这一功能。

definition: leisure/relaxation/not working/idle/to enjoy leisure/to lie fallow
to handle official business/to work (esp. in an office)
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
